item.title: Advent
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#they-wonder-why-i-hide-myself-from-everyone-vyl-wnanory|It was all true]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#they-wonder-why-i-hide-myself-from-everyone-vyl-wnanory|A parlour strode, and the night sets forever]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#they-wonder-why-i-hide-myself-from-everyone-vyl-wnanory|I stray in the quiet cold]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#they-wonder-why-i-hide-myself-from-everyone-vyl-wnanory|And you gird me when I dare to listen]] [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.

item.title: Black Rose Immortal
item.description: [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untamed.md#im-stepping-out-vyl-wnanory|In the name of desperation]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untamed.md#im-stepping-out-vyl-wnanory|I call your name]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untamed.md#im-stepping-out-vyl-wnanory|A lamentation I sigh]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/untamed.md#im-stepping-out-vyl-wnanory|Again and again]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#speeding-up-to-slow-down-vyl-wnanory|Spiritual eclipse]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.

item.title: Eternal Soul Torture
item.description: [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/can_you_feel_my_heart.md#im-scared-to-get-close-and-i-hate-being-alone-vyl-wnanory|The deceased awake from beyond their sleep.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/can_you_feel_my_heart.md#im-scared-to-get-close-and-i-hate-being-alone-vyl-wnanory|Search for blood and mortal meat.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/can_you_feel_my_heart.md#im-scared-to-get-close-and-i-hate-being-alone-vyl-wnanory|Maggots crawl out from their eyes.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/can_you_feel_my_heart.

item.title: Nectar
item.description: [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.md#i-dont-remember-the-moment-i-tried-to-forget-vyl-wnanory|I arose from the lullaby]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.md#i-dont-remember-the-moment-i-tried-to-forget-vyl-wnanory|Enduring yet another tale]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.md#i-dont-remember-the-moment-i-tried-to-forget-vyl-wnanory|You tempt me again]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.md#i-dont-remember-the-moment-i-tried-to-forget-vyl-wnanory|With your embrace, so tainted]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.md#i-dont-remember-the-moment-i-tried-to-forget-vyl-wnanory|Within the night you beckon]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/this_is_war/closer_to_the_edge.

item.title: The Night And The Silent Water
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-when-i-first-saw-the-country-vyl-wnanory|And so you left us]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-when-i-first-saw-the-country-vyl-wnanory|Jaded and gaunt, some September]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-when-i-first-saw-the-country-vyl-wnanory|Wilted with the seasons]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-when-i-first-saw-the-country-vyl-wnanory|But hidden inside the delusion]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.

item.title: To Bid You Farewell
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|I am awaiting]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|The sunrise]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|Gazing modestly through the coldest morning]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|Once it came you lied]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|Embracing us over]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.
